title: BEST BUILDS
body: Hey guys, comment down below what your personal builds for your main champions, be sure to include the runes and masteries as well.

replies.body:
{{champion:163}} 
{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:6}} 
{{item:3165}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} 

https://i.gyazo.com/f3d9b8e5c3b516befcfb3a979ea427af.png
https://i.gyazo.com/6b69cf8bd4446ed36a990a995e9aa485.png
https://i.gyazo.com/2e05c34eb6d65b7e3517f69d407a76c0.png
https://i.gyazo.com/4983ed566a77972336119cfb7f733963.png
https://i.gyazo.com/de727d31b30a9ed2017bd66c0074b921.png

https://i.gyazo.com/ccdcbd2ddd4b908221e927920d945a00.png

After the rlylais nerf, I figured I had to adapt. I took a movementspeed Taliyah build, to still be able to kite melee champions.
The build is relatively strong, but has the negative point in being not tanky. You die extremely fast if your positioning is bad.

> [{quoted}](name=TaliyahToMaster,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AzdBN8lN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-01T17:42:46.304+0000)

do you have a montage?

> [{quoted}](name=lll Rogue lll,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AzdBN8lN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-01T18:04:49.939+0000)

I do not unfortunately. My computer is a toaster so I can not record. You can rewatch games I played recently if you want to learn how to play her. 
http://www.replay.gg/search/euw/TaliyahToMaster#
